item.title: 关税混乱，亚美海运费将延续跌势
item.description: 业内专家表示，随着航运能力超过需求，以及关税和地缘政治紧张局势导致贸易路线发生变化，亚美海运费将在2025年进一步下降，尽管船舶改道有望限制一些损失。【原文：Asia-U.S. sea freight rates are set to drop further in 2025 as shipping capacity outpaces demand and trade routes shift due to tariffs and geopolitical tensions, though vessel rerouting is expected to limit some losses, industry experts said.】

item.title: 英国 Spectris 公司同意 KKR 提出的更高报价，收购战进入白热化阶段
item.description: 英国科学仪器制造商思百吉公司（Spectris）周二表示，已同意美国私募股权公司 KKR 提出的估值 48 亿英镑（64 亿美元）的更优惠报价，并撤回了对竞争对手 Advent 提出的更低报价的支持。【原文：British scientific instruments maker Spectris has agreed to a sweetened offer from U.S. private equity firm KKR valuing it at 4.8 billion pounds ($6.4 billion), it said on Tuesday, withdrawing its backing for a lower offer from rival suitor Advent.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧预测年销售额增长持平，上调成本节约目标
item.description: 全球最大的烈酒生产商帝亚吉欧周二预测，包括美国关税的影响在内，2026 财年的有机销售额增长将与 2025 财年相近，并将成本节约目标上调至约 6.25 亿美元。【原文：Diageo , the world's biggest spirits maker, forecast on Tuesday fiscal 2026 organic sales growth to be similar to fiscal 2025 including the impact of U.S. tariffs, and raised its cost-savings target to about $625 million.】

item.title: 台积电打击侵犯商业秘密行为，提起法律诉讼
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司周二在一份电子邮件声明中表示，该公司已对涉及潜在商业机密泄漏的员工启动法律程序并采取纪律措施。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. has launched legal proceedings and taken disciplinary action against employees involved in potential trade secret leaks, it said in an emailed statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 雨果博斯（Hugo Boss）第二季度营业利润超预期，得益于成本削减
item.description: 德国时装集团 Hugo Boss 周二公布的季度营业利润略好于预期，这得益于欧元走强对其销售造成的影响。【原文：German fashion group Hugo Boss reported a slightly better than expected quarterly operating profit on Tuesday, helped by cost measures as a stronger euro weighed on its sales.】

item.title: 日产汽车开始与工会谈判削减欧洲地区办事处的工作岗位
item.description: 据一份公司文件和内部电子邮件显示，日产汽车已开始与代表其欧洲地区办事处员工的工会就包括裁员在内的变革进行谈判。【原文：Nissan Motor has begun negotiations with the union representing staff at its European regional office about changes that will include job losses, according to a company document and internal emails.】

item.title: 英飞凌第三季度业绩强劲，略微上调运营盈利展望
item.description: 周二，德国芯片制造商英飞凌（Infineon）小幅上调了全年分部业绩利润率指导，此前该公司的季度数据超出了公司提供的预测。【原文：German chipmaker Infineon's slightly raised its full-year guidance for its segment result margin on Tuesday after its quarterly figure beat a company-provided forecast.】

item.title: 欧洲通信卫星组织报告全年盈利好于预期
item.description: 法国卫星运营商欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat）周二公布的年度收益好于预期，原因是政府和企业客户对其卫星互联网服务的兴趣日益浓厚。【原文：French satellite operator Eutelsat reported better-than-expected annual earnings on Tuesday, driven by growing interest in its satellite internet services from government and corporate customers.】

item.title: 欧洲老旧发电厂将在人工智能热潮的推动下进行数字化改造
item.description: 欧洲一些老化的燃煤和燃气发电厂可以期待一个更高科技的未来，因为微软和亚马逊等大型科技公司正寻求将这些发电厂改造成数据中心，并提供现成的电力和水源。【原文：Some of Europe's ageing coal and gas fired power plants can look forward to a more high-tech future as big tech players, such as Microsoft and Amazon, seek to repurpose them as data centres, with ready-made access to power and water.】

item.title: 韩国承诺帮助企业应对美国提高关税
item.description: 韩国财政部周二表示，韩国将采取措施帮助企业应对美国提高关税和拓展新市场，同时启动了一个特别工作组，为新政府的经济政策计划做准备。【原文：South Korea will prepare measures to help companies cope with higher U.S. tariffs and expand into new markets, the Finance Ministry said on Tuesday, as it kicked off a task force to prepare the new administration's economic policy plans.】

item.title: 不受地缘政治影响，中国企业赴美上市创纪录
item.description: 今年，寻求在美国上市的中国公司数量创下新高，因为繁琐的国内上市规则和更好的估值前景说服它们勇敢面对动荡的中美关系和美国要求对中国公司进行严格监管的呼声。【原文：A record number of Chinese companies are seeking a U.S. listing this year as onerous domestic listing rules and the prospect of better valuations convince them to brave volatile Sino-U.S. relations and U.S. calls for strict oversight of Chinese firms.】

item.title: 早间竞标：对于渴望美联储 "火箭燃料 "的市场来说，坏消息是好消息
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，Core Scientific 股东对 CoreWeave 合并要约的条款表示反对
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，CoreWeave 公司斥资 90 亿美元收购数据中心业主 Core Scientific 公司的交易正面临着潜在的反抗，目标公司的一些大股东认为，这可能会让他们吃亏。【原文：CoreWeave's $9 billion deal to buy data centre landlord Core Scientific is facing a potential revolt, with some top shareholders of the target company arguing it could leave them short-changed, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 初创公司 Anduril 成为美国第三家 SRM 供应商，国防需求不断增长
item.description: 国防技术初创企业安杜里尔工业公司（Anduril Industries）周二表示，该公司已成为美国固体火箭发动机（SRM）的第三家供应商，打破了长达数十年的双头垄断局面，并解决了导弹生产中的一个关键瓶颈，因为全球冲突推动了需求的增长。【原文：Defense technology startup Anduril Industries said on Tuesday it has become the third supplier of solid rocket motors (SRMs) to the United States, breaking a decades-long duopoly and addressing a critical bottleneck in missile production as global conflicts drive up demand.】

item.title: 印度保险监管机构对 PB 金融科技公司罚款 5000 万卢比
item.description: 印度保险监管机构对 PB Fintech 的在线保险聚合公司处以 5000 万卢比（约合 57 万美元）的罚款。【原文：India's insurance regulator has fined PB Fintech's online insurance aggregator arm 50 million rupees (around $570,000) for violating certain norms, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚互联网网络与亚马逊卫星服务签约
item.description: 澳大利亚政府拥有的互联网网络雇用亚马逊未经测试的初创卫星服务，为无法访问其地面网络的人提供连接，而不是埃隆-马斯克的 Starlink。【原文：The Australian government-owned internet network hired Amazon's untested startup satellite service to provide connectivity to people who cannot access its terrestrial network rather than Elon Musk's Starlink.】

item.title: 部长表示，澳大利亚正在考虑制定价格下限，以支持关键矿产项目
item.description: 澳大利亚资源部长马德琳-金（Madeleine King）表示，澳大利亚正在考虑设定价格下限，以支持包括稀土在内的关键矿产项目。【原文：Australia is considering setting a price floor to support critical minerals projects, including rare earths, Resources Minister Madeleine King said, in comments that led to a jump in share prices for Australian-listed rare earths miners.】

item.title: 美国关税、日元走强，丰田、本田为利润下滑做准备
item.description: 丰田汽车和本田汽车预计将在本周公布较弱的第一季度财报，原因是美国征收进口关税和日元走强对利润造成了压力，尽管这两家公司最大的海外市场对混合动力汽车的需求稳健。【原文：Toyota Motor and Honda Motor are expected to report weaker first-quarter earnings this week, as U.S. import tariffs and a stronger yen weigh on profits despite solid demand for hybrids in their biggest overseas markets.】

item.title: 日本贸易谈判代表将访问美国，敦促尽快实施汽车关税协议
item.description: 日本最高关税谈判代表赤泽亮世表示，他计划从周二起访问华盛顿，敦促美国总统唐纳德-特朗普签署一项行政命令，使双方商定的15%汽车关税税率生效。【原文：Japan's top tariff negotiator Ryosei Akazawa said he planned to visit Washington from Tuesday to press the United States to have President Donald Trump sign an executive order to bring an agreed 15% tariff rate on automobiles into effect.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 6 月家庭支出小幅增长，服务业不景气
item.description: 由于汽车和电子产品的热销被服务业的下滑所抵消，澳大利亚家庭支出在 6 月份小幅上升，这表明较低的借贷成本和较高的实际收入只是在缓慢地流入更广泛的经济领域。【原文：Australian household spending rose modestly in June as a rush for cars and electronics was offset by a slump in services, showing lower borrowing costs and higher real incomes are only slowly flowing into the broader economy.】

item.title: 亚洲股市反弹，美元兑日元因美联储降息押注而走低
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市连续第二个交易日上涨，美元则守住了大部分跌幅，因为投资者加大了对美联储将采取行动支撑全球最大经济体的押注。【原文：Shares in Asia rose for a second consecutive session and the U.S. dollar held most of its losses on Tuesday as investors increased bets the Federal Reserve will act to prop up the world's largest economy.】

item.title: 标普7月服务业采购经理人指数创14个月新高
item.description: 周二的一项私营部门调查显示，受需求强劲（包括新出口订单增加）的推动，7 月份中国服务业活动创下 14 个月来最快增速。【原文：China's services activity expanded at its fastest pace in 14 months in July, fuelled by stronger demand, including a rise in new export orders, a private-sector survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 降息概率上升，关税不确定性挥之不去，美元走软
item.description: 由于美联储降息几率上升对市场情绪造成影响，同时投资者评估了美国上周加征关税对经济造成的更广泛影响，美元周二走势摇摆不定。【原文：The U.S. dollar wavered on Tuesday as the rising odds of Federal Reserve rate cuts weighed on sentiment, while investors assessed the broader economic impact of U.S. tariffs unleashed last week.】

item.title: 澳新银行-Indeed 数据显示，澳大利亚 7 月份招聘广告下降 1
item.description: 受教育和零售业的拖累，澳大利亚 7 月份的招聘广告数量有所下降，但这仅部分抵消了上个月的增长，表明劳动力市场正在逐步放缓。【原文：Australian job advertisements fell in July, dragged down by the education and retail sectors, but that only partly offset the rise in the previous month and suggested the labour market is easing gradually.】

item.title: 澳大利亚承诺提供 8700 万美元，以拯救 Trafigura 的 Nyrstar 冶炼厂，推动关键矿产的发展
item.description: 澳大利亚周二表示，将为 Trafigura 旗下 Nyrstar 公司拥有的两家冶炼厂提供 1.35 亿澳元（8740 万美元）的资金支持，作为其成为西方盟国重要矿产供应商战略的一部分。【原文：Australia said on Tuesday that it will provide A$135 million ($87.4 million) in financial support for two smelters owned by Trafigura unit Nyrstar, as part of its strategy to become a key supplier of critical minerals to Western allies.】

item.title: 石油价格在创一周新低后变化不大，供应过剩担忧挥之不去
item.description: 石油输出国组织（OPEC+）同意在 9 月份再次大幅增产后，市场对供应过剩的担忧日益加剧，油价在连续三天下跌后，周二变化不大。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Tuesday after three days of declines on mounting oversupply concerns after OPEC+ agreed to another large output increase in September, though the potential for more Russian supply disruptions supported the market.】

item.title: 日本 7 月服务业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，日本 7 月服务业增长因需求向好而回升
item.description: 本周二，一份私营部门调查报告显示，由于国内需求旺盛，抵消了出口订单大幅下降和游客人数减少的影响，7 月份日本服务业活动创下五个月来最快增速。【原文：Japan's service sector activity rose at the fastest pace in five months in July, thanks to brisk domestic demand that offset a sharp drop in export orders and weaker tourist numbers, a private sector survey reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，白宫准备下令对因政治原因放弃客户的银行处以罚款
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，白宫正在准备一项行政命令，对银行因政治原因放弃客户的行为处以罚款。【原文：The White House is preparing an executive order that would fine banks for dropping customers for political reasons, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 6 月会议纪要显示，如果贸易摩擦缓解，日本央行部分官员认为有恢复加息的空间
item.description: 周二，日本央行六月份政策会议纪要显示，几位日本央行董事会成员表示，如果贸易摩擦缓和，央行将考虑恢复加息。【原文：A few Bank of Japan board members said the central bank would consider resuming interest rate increases if trade friction de-escalates, minutes of its June policy meeting showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 时事航空》编辑称，波音公司有望在近五年来首次试飞 777-9 型飞机
item.description: Air Current》编辑乔恩-奥斯特罗尔（Jon Ostrower）周一在 X 网站上发表文章，引述两位熟悉此事的人士的话说，波音公司预计最早将于 8 月 5 日进行 777-9 喷气式飞机约五年来的首次飞行。【原文：Boeing is expected to conduct the first flight of its 777-9 jet in about five years as early as August 5, Air Current editor Jon Ostrower said on Monday in a post on X, citing two people familiar with the matter.】
